metadata.title: CVE-2022-21227 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The package sqlite3 before 5.0.3 are vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS)which will invoke the toString function of the passed parameter. If passedan invalid Function object it will throw and crash the V8 engine.

criterions.comment: node-sqlite3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
